summary: Implemented a 4-route Valentine-themed frontend with shared layout, navigation, and page components referencing specified uploaded/generated images. However, required static image assets are not shown as added, Page 3 text does not exactly match the requested copy (missing leading/trailing spaces), and the diff introduces/changes Internet Identity/actor hook files and other unrequested UI elements (e.g., footer attribution, lightbox).

missing_requirements.requirement: Page 3 must display the text exactly: " I will always have all the gift that u gave Mee in my heart ".
missing_requirements.reason: The implemented text omits the leading and trailing spaces present in the required exact string.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add all 11 uploaded images to the frontend as static assets and reference them by filename (no backend image serving).
missing_requirements.reason: Pages reference files under /assets/uploads/*.jpg, but the diff summary does not show any uploaded image assets being added to the repository (e.g., under frontend/public/assets/uploads).

missing_requirements.requirement: Include generated images under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them (background, flower on Page 3, favicon site-wide).
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend references /assets/generated/*.png (background, flowers image, favicon) but the diff summary does not show the generated image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity / actor-query hook logic (login-related infrastructure) included despite non-goal of authentication and constraint not to edit immutable hook paths.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists authentication as a non-goal and marks frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts and frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts as immutable paths that must not be edited; diff shows these files added/changed content and main.tsx uses InternetIdentityProvider.
Not requested in requirements; adds external link in UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Lightbox modal behavior for galleries (Dialog-based image viewer).
hallucinated_features.reason: Requirements only asked for responsive galleries/grids; lightbox/dialog functionality was not requested.
